original_text: Like a farmer, Israel's people have planted the wind. So their harvest will be a strong storm! The crops that grow in their fields will not have any grain. So they will not be able to make flour for bread. Even if the crops do make some grain, foreign people will take it for themselves. Like a farmer, Israel's people have planted the wind. So their harvest will be a strong storm! The crops that grow in their fields will not have any grain. So they will not be able to make flour for bread. Even if the crops do make some grain, foreign people will take it for themselves. Like a farmer, Israel's people have planted the wind.
korean_text: 그들이 바람을 심고 광풍을 거둘 것이라 심은 것이 줄기가 없으며 이삭은 열매를 맺지 못할 것이요 혹시 맺을지라도 이방 사람이 삼키리라

sentences.original_text: Israel's people have planted the wind
So their harvest will be a strong storm
The crops that grow in their fields will not have any grain
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 밭에서 자라는 곡식은 알곡이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: So they will not be able to make flour for bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 빵을 위한 가루를 만들 수 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Even if the crops do make some grain
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 곡식이 약간의 알곡을 맺는다 할지라도

sentences.original_text: foreign people will take it for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 이방 사람들이 그것을 자기들을 위해 가져가리라

sentences.original_text: Israel's people have planted the wind
So their harvest will be a strong storm
The crops that grow in their fields will not have any grain
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 밭에서 자라는 곡식은 알곡이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: So they will not be able to make flour for bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 빵을 위한 가루를 만들 수 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Even if the crops do make some grain
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 곡식이 약간의 알곡을 맺는다 할지라도

sentences.original_text: foreign people will take it for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 이방 사람들이 그것을 자기들을 위해 가져가리라

sentences.original_text: Israel's people have planted the wind
